title: Analysis of the Relationship Between Cognitive Load and Learning Satisfaction in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Analysis of cognitive load and satisfaction in simulation/VR-based language learning to explore effective online lecture design strategies

learning_goals: Learners can measure and analyze cognitive load in an online simulation environment.
Learners can perform self-assessment via a satisfaction survey after VR-based language learning activities.
Learners can write a report explaining the correlation between cognitive load and satisfaction.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
